alert.note: Alert for Escambia Inland; Okaloosa Inland; Santa Rosa Inland (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 6:16PM EDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A cluster of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Okaloosa, northern Santa Rosa and north central Escambia Counties through 600 PM CDT... At 515 PM CDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm 11 miles southeast of Jay, or 15 miles north of Milton, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Century, Flomaton, Baker and Jay. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for south central Alabama...and northwestern Florida.

area.areaDesc: Escambia Inland; Okaloosa Inland; Santa Rosa Inland
